name: healthcare
description:
The healthcare command extracts hospitals, clinics, pharmacies, and medical practices from OSM data. Categories include:

- Hospital: hospitals, clinics
- Doctor: general practitioners, doctors
- Specialist: dentists, optometrists, physiotherapists
- Pharmacy: pharmacies, chemists
- Emergency: emergency departments, urgent care

Includes accessibility and specialty information.

options.-t, --type: Filter by type: hospital, pharmacy, dentist, etc.
options.-c, --category: Filter by category: hospital, doctor, specialist, pharmacy, emergency, other
options.-f, --format: Output format: geojson, json, csv (default: geojson)

output:
Healthcare facilities with:
- healthcare_type: Facility type
- name: Facility name
- operator: Operating organization
- specialty: Medical specialties
- emergency: Has emergency services
- wheelchair: Accessibility
- phone, website: Contact info
